text: The 1921 Big Ten Conference Men's Golf Championship was held in 1921 at Indian Hills. The team champion was Drake with a score of 684. It was also the first year of 36-hole medal play with the top four individual scores from each school counting towards the championship. ==Team results== {| class=wikitable !Place !! Team !! Score |- | align=center|1 || Drake || 684 |- | align=center|2 || Chicago || 698 |- | align=center rowspan=2|T3 || Illinois || rowspan=2|709 |- | Northwestern |- | align=center|5 || Lewis Institute || 755 |} ==References== Category:Big Ten Conference men's golf Big Ten Conference Men's Golf Championship
title: 1921 Big Ten Conference Men's Golf Championship
